attributes.action: Limit the sale of baby formula to parents
attributes.additional_details:
Currently, people are stockpiling baby milk often for reselling online at a higher price, making it impossible for parents to buy for their young babies.
There is no other choice for them on what they eat so not being able to access this is dangerous.
attributes.background: To have to present a mother's free prescription card to be allowed to buy first milk.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302823

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
